name: Global Puzzling System
description: Global Puzzling System is a short puzzle game inspired by the everyday challenge of car navigation. My intention in designing it was to challenge the player's ability for spatial reasoning, planning, and comprehension of unique movement mechanics.  The game contains a total of 26 puzzles spanning 7 distinctly themed road maps; in each puzzle, the player is given a list of directions, which they must rearrange to guide their car through the road network to their destinations.
